t: Petition · Stop BNI delivering Amazon Packages. - Canada · Change.org
s: October 4, 2019 - BNI has been the bane of many an online shopper. The reviews on Yellow Pages for BNI as a company are 9/10 complains about amazon package delivery. With a 1 out of 5-star rating due to that. This petition aims to have Amazon.ca drop BNI's contract to deliver Amazon packages.
